reviews.review_msg: I enjoyed class and thought he explained things well. However, I would have liked more examples in the lectures because sometimes there were types of questions on the assignmentsexams that we had never seen before. If you drop by his office he is almost always willing to help if you have questions. Exams are really tough, but grades are curved.
Final is extremely hard. But u can learn lots of things for the further study in the statistics
Extremely helpful course for future studying in statistic. Exam is hard. But you can learn things in his course.

On top of being an excellent lecturer he is one of a rare breed of professor that has a great understanding assessment. His tests always examine the material covered, and I found his assignments to be interesting on top of building the skills taught in class.
He's a really informative professor. The assignments may be a little difficult, but he makes sure that he's avaliable to help with any difficulty during office hours.
